comments:
The bug has been marked as critical as it presents a very important customer problem. As a result of this bug report designs created by clients will be unusable in the latest BIRT version. This is unacceptable.

The attached report was created using BIRT 2.1.2. The latest BIRT 2.2 cannot handle it and throws errors when you try to inspect its data sources.

1. Download the attached report design
2. open it
3. Navigate to "Data Sets" and double click "All Elements"
4. Now click on "DTPXML DataSet" or "Table Mapping" or "Column Mapping"

PROBLEM: UI page isn't displayed on the right side AND the following exception is being thrown:

java.lang.NullPointerException

Created an attachment (id=61142)
report design created using BIRT 2.1.2

report design that is unusable on BIRT 2.2

This is a known bug and has been fixed in latest build. Please try Build later than 3/19/2007.

Thanks.
Lin
